name: Instruments Checks
comments: This is a One HTML page challenge! The goal was to build a single page application in ONE html file in Javascript only (no framework).
technologies: ES6, Maps API, CSS filters, Mobile Design

name: Projects Statistics
comments: Another One HTML page challenge! Some dynamic graphs and tables with a colourful timeline for Project Managements.
technologies: ES6, Chart.js, Google Charts, Responsive Design

name: Svelte Material
description: A library for using the latest Material Design components in Svelte.
comments: Implemented some HTML templates ready to use for greenfield projects.
